summary: Completed UI testing of Finance Dashboard and System Validation features. Backend APIs fully functional, Finance Dashboard UI working correctly, System Validation page has loading issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Page shows loading spinner indefinitely, content doesn't render despite API returning data successfully
Direct URL navigation to /admin/system-validation redirects to login page

integration_issues.issue: API returns data correctly but UI doesn't render the validation checklist and reconciliation results

passed_tests: Finance Dashboard navigation link visible to admin
System Validation navigation link visible to admin
Finance Dashboard page loads and displays all 5 key metrics correctly
Finance Dashboard date range filters present and functional
Finance Dashboard account type filter present
Finance Dashboard Current Month button present
Finance Dashboard data precision (3 decimal places) maintained
Backend Finance Dashboard API working (Cash: 0.00, Bank: 0.00, Credit: 998.64, Debit: 0.00, Net Flow: 998.64)
Backend System Validation API working (17/18 checks passed)
Backend Finance Reconciliation API working (✅ PASS)
Backend Inventory Reconciliation API working (❌ FAIL - 6 mismatches expected)
Backend Gold Reconciliation API working (✅ PASS)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix System Validation page UI loading issue - API returns data correctly but frontend doesn't render the validation checklist content. The page shows loading spinner indefinitely.
